STARTER: Do you have any pets? How long have you had them, and what do you like most about them?
text:
[Starter]: Do you have any pets? How long have you had them, and what do you like most about them?
[Student]: I think there are a lot of young ones in the family He said this for his mothers sake
[Teacher]: . It seems to me that his mother was trying to get him to talk about his family, or perhaps his love for pets. He's trying to be helpful and encouraging, but he's also trying to show that he's a caring person. This
[Student]: is his chance to teach others to read books and do everything they can to help their families when they want them to be better than them at school by giving their children lessons or anything they can learn from reading well enough to take care of themselves as teachers
[Teacher]: at school and get good grades. He thinks he can help them become better people and get the grades they need. He's saying that if he helps them learn how to read and write well, then they can become better and get more than their parents
